mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_name, user_email, user_pwd, user_phone, user_addr, user_birth, user_gender) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPwd}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddr}, #{userBirth}, #{userGender})
mapper.update: update user set user_pwd = #{newPwd} where user_id = #{userId}
update user set user_name = #{newName} where user_id = #{userId}
update user set user_email = #{newEmail} where user_id = #{userId}
update user set user_phone = #{newPhone} where user_id = #{userId}
update user set user_addr = #{newAddr} where user_id = #{userId}

choose.otherwise: and user_id like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or user_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or user_email like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or user_phone like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

mapper.select: select count(*) from user where true

select * from user where true
order by user_id asc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
